other.text: According to studies, some lullabies provide advice, like the Babylonian lullaby, and quite a few others offer the space to sing the unsung, say the unsayable.

definition.en_def: Guidance or recommendations concerning prudent future action.
definition.example: She gave me some valuable advice on how to improve my writing.
